author: Simon Difford
description: A medium-sweet Scotch whisky-laced combination of chocolate, coconut and orange. I revisited this cocktail in November 2022. The original recipe was 45ml (1½oz) Scotch whisky, 15ml (½oz) white cacao, 15ml (½oz) coconut rum, 45ml (1½oz) orange juice, 5ml (1 barspoon) grenadine syrup.
name: Scotch Bounty
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
